程序包 com.dadatoolkit.android.app.systemuihider
的使用

  • 使用com.dadatoolkit.android.app.systemuihider的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    com.dadatoolkit.android.app.systemuihider  
  • com.dadatoolkit.android.app.systemuihider使用的com.dadatoolkit.android.app.systemuihider中的类 
    类和说明
    SystemUiHider
    A utility class that helps with showing and hiding system UI such as the status bar and navigation/system bar.
    SystemUiHider.OnVisibilityChangeListener
    A callback interface used to listen for system UI visibility changes.
    SystemUiHiderBase
    A base implementation of SystemUiHider.
